## Description

Please provide a brief description of the changes in this pull request.

## Type of Change

Please select the relevant option:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Configuration change
- [ ] Database schema change

## Testing

Please describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes:

- [ ] Application starts successfully
- [ ] All existing functionality works as expected
- [ ] New functionality works as intended
- [ ] Database migrations (if applicable) work correctly

## Checklist

Please ensure all items are completed before requesting review:

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Database Changes

If this PR includes database changes:

- [ ] Database schema changes are backward compatible
- [ ] Migration scripts are provided (if needed)
- [ ] Sample data is updated (if applicable)
